mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tn_ms_member WHERE member_id = 'admin' AND member_pw = #{member_pw}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tn_ms_member
WHERE UPPER(${select}) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT a.member_no , a.member_id , a.member_name , a.member_email , a.member_phone , a.member_subscription , a.member_rating , a.member_marketingcheck , b.com_code as com_code1 , c.com_code as com_code2 FROM tn_ms_member a , tc_ms_com_code b , tc_ms_com_code c WHERE member_no = #{member_no} AND a.member_rating = b.com_code_no AND a.member_subscription = c.com_code_no

SELECT COUNT(a.music_no) FROM tn_ms_music a ,tn_ms_album b ,tn_ms_artist c WHERE a.album_no = b.album_no AND a.artist_no = c.artist_no
AND UPPER(${select}) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT a.music_no , a.album_no , a.artist_no , a.music_title , a.music_lyrics , NVL(a.music_composition,'없음') as music_composition , a.music_write , NVL(a.music_arrange,'없음') as music_arrange , a.music_genre , a.music_like , a.music_playcount , a.music_adult , a.music_albumorder , b.album_title , c.artist_name , d.com_code FROM tn_ms_music a ,tn_ms_album b ,tn_ms_artist c ,tc_ms_com_code d WHERE a.music_no = #{music_no} AND a.album_no = b.album_no AND a.artist_no = c.artist_no AND a.music_genre = d.com_code_no

SELECT a.rn , a.album_no , a.artist_no , a.album_title , a.album_type , a.album_genre , a.album_commany , TO_CHAR(a.album_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS album_date , a.album_like , a.artist_name , b.com_code FROM (SELECT row_number() over (order by album_no) rn , a.album_no , a.artist_no , a.album_title , a.album_type , a.album_genre , a.album_commany , a.album_date , a.album_like , b.artist_name FROM tn_ms_album a ,tn_ms_artist b WHERE a.artist_no = b.artist_no
AND UPPER(${select}) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')
) a
,tc_ms_com_code b WHERE a.rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} AND a.album_genre = b.com_code_no
ORDER BY rn

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tn_ms_album a ,tn_ms_artist b WHERE a.artist_no = b.artist_no
AND UPPER(${select}) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT a.album_title , a.album_no , a.artist_no , a.album_type , a.album_introduce , a.album_commany , a.album_agency , TO_CHAR(a.album_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS album_date , a.album_like , a.album_genre , b.artist_name , c.com_code FROM tn_ms_album a ,tn_ms_artist b ,tc_ms_com_code c WHERE a.album_no = #{album_no} AND a.artist_no = b.artist_no AND a.album_genre = c.com_code_no

SELECT a.rn , a.artist_no , a.artist_name , TO_CHAR(a.artist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS artist_date , a.artist_type , a.artist_company , TO_CHAR(a.artist_debut,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS artist_debut , a.artist_genre , a.artist_fan , b.com_code FROM (SELECT row_number() over (order by artist_no) rn , artist_no , artist_name , artist_date , artist_type , artist_company , artist_debut , artist_genre , artist_fan FROM tn_ms_artist
WHERE UPPER(${select}) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')
) a ,tc_ms_com_code b WHERE a.rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} AND a.artist_genre = b.com_code_no
ORDER BY rn

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tn_ms_artist
WHERE UPPER(${select}) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT a.artist_no , a.artist_name , TO_CHAR(a.artist_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS artist_date , a.artist_type , a.artist_introduce , a.artist_company , TO_CHAR(a.artist_debut,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS artist_debut , NVL(a.artist_awarded,'없음') as artist_awarded , a.artist_genre , a.artist_fan , b.com_code FROM tn_ms_artist a ,tc_ms_com_code b WHERE a.artist_no = #{artist_no} AND a.artist_genre = b.com_code_no
SELECT album_no ,album_title ,artist_no FROM tn_ms_album WHERE artist_no = #{artistNo} ORDER BY album_no
SELECT artist_no ,artist_name FROM tn_ms_artist ORDER BY artist_no
